lines.text: I don't think he's much of a pet. He's more of a companion.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Could you light the candle?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I will in a little bit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (whines)

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: Hearts next to it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What's your name?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Reeksus."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Reeksus. You got it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Open door!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Through the door then.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I kick him really hard in the ass. Lead the way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The door is closed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Lead the way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm bound! You made me put rope on it!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is there a latch, a door knob?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is a handle latch and it looks like there is a lock mechanism to it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hmm, a lock.

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: Whose purview is this?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's you. You take look. Make sure it does not explode on you.

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: I don't see any wicks. I don't see anything explosive.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check if you want to check for traps.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What did you roll? Well, she rolled a 20.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's important.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Very nice. It's a lock mechanism. A relatively simple lock. It is not trapped. So, you could easily undo this with your thieves' tools.

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: So I do something so I can do that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep, so you roll another d20, and then add your proficiency modifier and your dexterity modifier.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This plus this, so plus eight to what you roll.

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: So that is 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Whereas inside here you have that damp, hard-water, Pirates of the Caribbean ride smell that's in the water chamber, beyond that as the door opens this musty, almost mildewed smell hits you. It's earthy, it's fresh, it's natural, but it's definitely an underground, familiar smell.

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: Why can we never encounter a field of flowers?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should I light up a rock again?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, I can do it. So I pick up a rock and light it up, and toss it in front of us. Just keep kicking it down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The walls begin to slowly glow the further in you go. You begin to notice that, aside from a few small crystalline areas, there are heavy bits of fungus that are beginning to appear along these chambers. Glowing green, orange, blue mushrooms and clusters of fungal matter that are beginning to give this faint luminescence to the interior of the chamber. And you now very much understand where the smell was coming from. As you begin to curve around the right side of it, the tunnel widens a little broader to about 15 feet wide. The mushrooms begin to get larger and larger, some of them four feet tall or bigger. You can see large pillar stalactites and stalagmites are meeting in the center where they give their own little offshoots of fungus. But some of these are getting very big and the pathways are getting a little narrow to move past until, as you turn around one of the right bends, the fungus is pushed around to the point where it's a very narrow passage to push through these fungal forests.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't like mushrooms.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're quite tasty, actually.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Could make a glowing salad of some kind.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, yeah. Hey, Reeksus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Do you want to go in front of us and lead the way to your king?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Okay." And he carefully turns to his side and thins up and slowly-- with disadvantage because he's bound-- still effectively manages to squiggle his way between the small path. And you can see he knows it pretty well, through the small cluster of dense tall fungus safely to the other side.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it bad to touch it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I would not recommend it."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And the rope is still trailing from him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's 30 feet of slack rope. It's on the ground over there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If only we had some fire.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. Do you want me to set these on fire? Because I have some. I mean, is it safe to burn? What if it sets off a poison when they're on fire? I've heard that burning mushrooms could get you, you know--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Eating

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, it's not fumes?

lines.name: TALIESIN, LIAM, TRAVIS
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh! I wouldn't know. They don't allow that kind of stuff at mage school. Okay! I'm going to go through! Wait, am I going to burn it? I'm going to get to the other side and then I'm going to try to burn it. I don't want to burn Reeks. Okay. I go to the other side.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Go ahead and make a straight dexterity check, please.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right. Woo-hoo! What is that, 18 or 19? 18 plus dexterity. 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Following suit, you deftly follow the same pattern and come out the other side, not even touching any of the fungus with either side of your armored shoulder pauldrons. Your mantle, I guess it would be.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should I try to burn them now? What do you guys think?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Touching mushroom, breathing mushroom?

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: Should we test it first? Touch it to test it to see if it affects us?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm afraid they might release spores and then become airborne which is why I only recommend trying to burn it first.

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: That would release a lot of spores.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How far away can you cast that shit from?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's ranged about eight. I don't know what that means.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is this Burning Hands?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, Fire Bolt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, Fire Bolt? Oh, it's a pretty decent range. Just a single hit, yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What if we all back up to our different sides, yeah? Get back as far as you can and we'll get way the fuck back. See what happens.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then I'll hit it because I can do cantrips a lot, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cantrips you can do as many times as you want.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fuck-- I mean heck yeah! I'm going to do--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They don't let cursing happen in mage school either?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They don't curse in mage school. I'm sorry about that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, they're real tough on that in Dalaran.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They smack your hands. I'll tell you that much.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They wouldn't tell you but Madame had a potty mouth.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to cast Fire Bolt at the mushrooms. That gives me 2d10 fire damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, even with a singular bolt, the mushroom's pretty big and it's not moving. It's pretty easy to hit. You hit the first one a while away and as it impacts you watch as the flames burn up. Immediately the strange, subtle squeaking sound releases as it shakes and shimmies. And you watch as spores filter out and then ignite from the nearby flames that immediately destroy the cloud before it can emerge. And the fungus slowly withers and crumples over.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, good! I do the same thing on all of the mushrooms that are along the path.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. One by one you create this pathway, destroying the fungus on the opposite side. Are you still holding the rope?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As the flames begin--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But I went through, remember? I went through and I'm holding the rope on my side.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. So as you're destroying these the rope pulls a little taut to your side as you begin clearing the path. And you look over and you can see your friend is peeking around a rock. You can see this glow on the other side of a boulder around the bend where he's looking over and looks back at you and is like--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (mutters)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hold on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Okay." The rest of you guys, there is a path wide enough to follow through.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We join.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're coming? Okay, I go over to Reek.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see another kobold standing there looking at your tied-up friend and the rest of you. And he goes, "Hey! Hey! Want to buy a fungus?" As you look on the inside of the cloak you can see these little patchwork pouches of different gathered mushrooms, orange, green and blue. "I sell, good "price. Come. Buy."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, what do they do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Taste good! Ugh. Bad. Good bad. Fun!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't understand what he just told me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, to begin with you're not alarmed by us being here in the first place?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I need to make money."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's not look a gift horse in the mouth. A gift rat. Orange?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Orange fungus. Slight citrus-y taste. Weird fuzzy sensation. 40 gold."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And the other two were--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What about blue?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Blue fungus. 30 gold. Make for good digestion tract."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll take the blue one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You have that much gold?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You now have a helping of blue fungus.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What's the third?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Green fungus! 25 gold. More of the onion of fungus family."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's a good topping.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah!"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I grab rope that is holding Reekcheeks and bring him over. "You know this one?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "He is strange one. Don't like him. I don't-- kobolds stay away."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is he problem?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (whispering) "I don't know."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You be nice to him!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's the-- they're real--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I punch him in the eye.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cry of pain)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You only live once. Orange.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You've got to keep them in line with tough love.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I take the orange.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do I know anything about this blue fungus?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a medicine check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's good for digestion I hear.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16, okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So eating this fungus has a chance of poisoning you, but also has the opportunity to heighten your senses and perceptive capabilities for a short time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, it's a gamble.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How about mine?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So that's the orange one, you got the--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have the orange.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've got the orange.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, he got the blue.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sorry, you're the blue. The orange one is the one you got. So you get the heightened senses, yours has a chance of poisoning you as well and or has the possibility of healing some hit points.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Down the hatch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, both of you make constitution saving throws.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Give it to Mikey, he'll try anything.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Now, because you're next to me I have Aura of Protection which is plus two to saves?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it would.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, that helps because my constitution's really low.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes! 21.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The poisoned status means all of your attacks are at disadvantage and your ability checks are at disadvantage as well. So you have advantage on all perception and investigation checks for the next hour.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Everything is crystal clear.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, your eyes dilate suddenly and I know kung-fu.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah! Show me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Bundle, you heal six hit points.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I heal six?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, at least it healed you while it poisoned you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm also going to cast Lesser Restoration and make the poison go away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So the poison vanishes from your system at which point the kobold, "Mushhuckster "Max thanks you. Now off to find new ventures!" Pulls the cloak in front of his head and darts away on little ninja feet. Back through the mushrooms and vanishes into darkness.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's weird he's selling mushrooms to random people in caverns like that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I highly recommend the blue fungus.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: In another life, I would have hit that guy before he said a single word. I would have dropped his ass.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Somehow I know that to be true about you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point you hear a strange guttural growl from the path that you were traveling near a pillar of stone encased in mushrooms as from around one back of it you see a shape of a large, hunched, bestial dwarf ape-like creature standing at about six and a half feet tall as its long arms drag on the ground. It's drooling down its own chest. You've experienced, most of you in particular, this is a trogg, a large subterranean creature, but this trogg is acting strange. It's giggling to itself. (deep laughter) Holds the pillar and grabs some mushroom and scarfs it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: Here we go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (grunts) And he starts walking around the edge, looks around the edge right to you, "It's "real?"

lines.name: TALIESIN, JENNIFER, LAURA
lines.text: No!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Come on! Natural 20! About fucking time! There we are! No!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Too weird! I see things!" You see two other large troggs come from behind going. They're tripping balls. One of them is currently clutching a long staff of purple and gold inlay and is gnawing on it like a large lollipop. You can't see the top because it's jammed in his mouth. They're all looking at you going (laughing).

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to use Thaumaturgy to make us all look really fuzzy, in and out, if I can do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You may.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ooh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (groaning) One of them picks his nose slowly.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I hadn't thought this through.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I use Prestidigitation and create light flares around him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (gagging) Pulls it out. You can see on the top of the staff, it has these awesome, pointed purple stones, three of them in a triangular pattern that float, locked into place. (licking) Jams it back in his mouth and begins chewing on it again.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can I make the staff look like it's made of snakes or something? Can I Thaumaturgy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thaumaturgy is very simple. It's a very faint effect that wouldn't have an effect if they weren't already tripping balls.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If they're already tripping can we say: Whoa, why are you holding that snake in your hand?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Please! Oh no, 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11. He goes (gags). Pulls it out, looks at it, "Hey, a snake!" and begins trying to bite through. You watch as his teeth are breaking on the metal.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll cast Command on him and say: drop that wicked snake!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay! What's your spell DC?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He rolled a 13 minus one. This trogg is not very wise. Drops it. You see he's putting his tongue through his mouth and bits of teeth are falling out of his lips and bouncing off of his belly. (grunts) They're all currently entranced by the movement and the lights that you've created.

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: I'd love to collect the thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a stealth check to see if you can not gather their gaze as they're currently entranced by this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're doing our best outside inflatable people.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (groaning)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should back away slowly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (farts)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, slowly. Okay!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Reeks, if we leave them, will you keep guiding the way?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Behind them? The way is where they came from."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Quazi? Feel like introducing yourself?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Good news, my brothers. We come from both the future and the past.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All three of them (grunt).

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let me tell you. Your fathers are proud of you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The two on the sides look in to the one in the center who goes, "You know father?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I've been this fucked up before. Your mothers love you and are proud of you!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Persuasion, you said. That's 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18? His giant, meaty, fur-covered hands clap onto your shoulders of your armor and pulls you in close. You can smell the horrible trogg breath billow out across your face. Almost thickens the air around you. It smells of rotting meat and a multitude of terrible memories.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And the deep secret is: You know that I am you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He releases you and takes a step back and goes. (sobbing) And starts sobbing openly. The two other troggs clap the side of his shoulders and start sobbing, too. The three of them sit in place and start having the most basic of existential crises you could watch.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Slowly making our way around the existential crisis.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The rest of you make a stealth check. You already made one. The rest of you make a stealth check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Doing inches this way like an arc. And Papa and Mama don't want you to hurt you! You have to love you!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get the sense they're picking up every third word due to the limits of their language comprehension. They're like, (grunting) "Love! (grunting) Ove! (sobbing) Guh!" They're just making guttural noises at this point.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Give into it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a stealth check, please.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, that's a 20!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys slowly curve around the three sobbing troggs, staff in hand, you exit through the tunnel they had passed through. The fungus begins to give way as the heat begins to rise steadily once you traverse further into this tunnel. You're holding the staff. As you're walking, looking over it, a slow voice beings to peek in seemingly from nowhere. It says, "Oh, "wondrous. Another unworthy soul. I command you to throw me into a river and be done with it."

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: Hmm. First, you must tell us your secrets.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I require a wielder who walks the path of power, fool."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What's it saying?

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: It requires a wielder who walks the path of power, fool.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Magic?

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: I'm not calling you a fool, it's calling you a fool. Magic.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I do magic!

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: Take him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you take the staff, it warms to your touch. For a moment, there's an awkward silence of: did she actually hear anything, or has your friend been crazy the whole time you've been traveling?

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: Both.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A voice slowly echoes in, "Ah, you! You have potential. A withered seed that could blossom into "a tyrant of the arcane."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I'm pretty blossomed already, but okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes. You will do. I am Aluneth and together, we will do great things." And that's where we're going to take a break.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ooh! You've got sentient weapons in this thing! The little gems are floating in a triangle?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're held aloft by some mystical power.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fancy!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll show you pictures of it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nicely done! Your baptism is going well!

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: Sorry about trying the narrative thing! I was like: Oh shit!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it's all good! First time in, you just figure it out. You're doing great.

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: Oh, there's a wall there!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pretty sure it's coming up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Notebooks in the store!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep!

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: Where's the notebook?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Show the Feywild!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Now I want to do Russian now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, we used to play on that server.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, you dragged me onto Silverhand!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so that's kind of cool. So hi, everybody on Silverhand and those guilds and beyond.

lines.name: TALIESIN, MATT
lines.text: It's been a while.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We are such fake nerds.

lines.name: TRAVIS, TALIESIN
lines.text: Totes fake.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I just want to go deadlift right now.

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: I aspire to nerd.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You aspire what?

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: I aspire to nerd.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So as we come back in, you have acquired--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yay! Should I read it out loud?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you'd like to.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have acquired Aluneth. "This ancient, extremely powerful staff was once owned by "Aegwynn." Egwin. Agewin.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: "The only female guardian of Tirisfal. This staff carries a mind far more ancient than most "things in Azeroth." My spell attack rolls gain a +3 to hit. Whenever I deal damage, I deal two additional hit points of force damage. That's amazing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're clutching the staff, as it speaks to you in your mind: "Together, we will do great "things. But you must survive. So: be smart. Stay alive. And perhaps ditch these unnecessary "dregs."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're pretty cool, actually. Well, some of them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who's cool?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, I'm cool.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What are you talking about?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What are you doing? Did you eat mushrooms?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You said "They're pretty cool."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You were talking out loud to no one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, no! It's the staff! It has a voice!

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: What did it say? I heard it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It said that I'm really amazing and that I'm going to do good things. I think that it's like a really powerful weapon. It's like the kind of thing you take with you for several levels at least.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How did we agree that you get the epic loot drop?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Staff of flirting.

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: He wouldn't speak to me. I'm too tall.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's probably what it is.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think it's your own positive nature, speaking to you from yourself.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's possible. My mama and papa are very proud of me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, that's up to you and them. I don't know shit about that.

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: Is he you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it a he? I don't know.

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: Is

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, him? Not staff. I'm confused.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're currently on this platform.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: See, this would have been an appropriate place to build bridges that are kind of iffy. Two of them, even.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Hey, Reeks?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Which direction is your king?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Uh--" And he bends forward and tries to get one hand up, and the finger goes like--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, look! Your hands are working again!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Ow!" (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Mind over matter.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They mostly just let me through."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, Okay, well, we'll figure it out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Now, now, you know King Tagwaggle will be very disappointed--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Togwaggle will be very disappointed if we are not brought before him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Wait. Across." And the finger, the broken hand, tries to lift up. "Across. I remember! That "way. That way to Togwaggle."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Straight across?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I want to take a quick insight check and give him an eye. I don't trust this one. That's not bad. That's a 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16? Kind of hard to read. You get the sense that something doesn't sit right with the way he's saying it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Aerwin, do you see anything hinky in this room? Anything off? Bad?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can make a perception check if you like.

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: I'd like to make a perception check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I join her with my heightened senses from my blue fungi?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You may. With advantage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What's that? Okay, that's 16, plus perception.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So as you both glance over, you notice the part that's collapsed and taken down that portion of the bridge, there is no way through. It is completely sealed off. You both notice simultaneously, on the central cross platform in the center of the chamber, where you see across the broken center there's a bunch of scraps of metal. Empty shells of armor plates that have been left there and have long been covered in dust and soot.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're laying a trap. I'll bet you anything.

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: We need to get closer.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: With darkvision, could I see them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this distance, no. You'll probably have to get closer to the central platform to get a better view.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. I'm going to try and go for the central platform.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait! But you just said there's a big pile of metal in the middle, and two creatures hiding! What if they're waiting to explode the middle?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And we're standing here talking in this chamber.

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: Could I take some of my ball bearings and go across? I have my ball bearings in my pocket to trip them, and go across and try to get closer.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could throw them out in front of you to try and see if it hits them.

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: No, I'll have them with me in case I need them as a defense. Can I sneak across to see them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you pull out your small pouch of ball bearings, hold them in your hand. Go and make a stealth check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's good. You're going to be good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's not bad. You have to leap across to get to the smaller platform that's going up, because there are the breaks in it. What's your strength? Ten?

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: Zero.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, so maximum ten. So you get about a 10-foot jump across that way. It's about a 10-foot jump to get to that smaller platform. You, keeping low, using the balls of your feet, make a leap for it, just catching the edge ever so carefully. If you can make an acrobatics check to use your momentum to tumble onto it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Acrobatics, you say?

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: 12 total.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Using your shoulder, you roll, and using your momentum you come to the other side of that and leap a second time towards that other side of that platform. I need you to make one more check for me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The flesh is gone. They long died there. Either they were trapped and couldn't find a way out and slowly starved or dehydrated, but there's nothing but a pile of their equipment, their weapons, their armor, and bone. At this point, the floor below you gently rumbles a bit, and you watch as some of the metal scraps scrape across the ground on their own. They leap up into the air and form bracers, some sort of large, thick pieces of armor, separate, as molten rock shoots up and flame ignites, filling the center of the empty armor into a large, elemental-like enemy made of fire and magma within the armor. You watch as this magma rager, appearing, giving this flexing roar, goes charging towards you. What are you doing?

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: Am I doing this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, you're definitely not hidden from it yet. You have to hide first.

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: Okay. Strength is not my thing. I think I'm going to run.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you run back the opposite direction, leap, head across the way. Go ahead and make an acrobatics check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fine. You spin, roll off your shoulder, leap, a second time on the other side, and make one more acrobatics check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not a problem. You make it across to the other side and you watch as this large, raging elemental stops at the edge, scoots back, and stands there, waiting, on the center platform.

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: Well, at least now we know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's intimidating. What about the two things laying in wait? Were they setting a trap?

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: They were dead.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They were undead?

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: They're dead.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just dead.

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: They were regular dead.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, that's iffy. You know. But also tempting. Because what did they have when they died?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should definitely check it out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I can chuck you over.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But there's a giant flame monster.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, yeah. First one thing, then the other.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How are we going to beat him?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I could stun him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You think that would work?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Might. We'd have to be fast. And no one could fall.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm not going to fall.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why did you think I was saying that you would fall?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You were staring straight at me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Was I?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: One of us could fall.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Now you seem sarcastic, because you're rolling your eyes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm not very good at jumping, but I can cast Fly on myself.

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: (gasps) She is invisible. She has invisibility.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I think we have to get to-- did you trust Skeever?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Reeks?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well... Hey, that's a good point. Reeks?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why didn't you warn us about the giant monster in the middle there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Sorry, I forgot."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What happened to your voice?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What?"

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: Did they die from the monster in the middle because they are on the far side? Or did they die trying to get out that entrance because it is not really an entrance?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's deep. Maybe they just fell, and they couldn't climb back up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They had to have gotten there for a reason, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There are these big bruisers floating there, staring at us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just staring at you, yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can fly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have seen you do it so many times. Can't you skirt the edge of this room and go over there? You don't need to go through this guy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Over to the alcove?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sure, see if there is anything worth, you know. This is what we live for.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can try.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fly fly away. Fly far away.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am not going, too much hassle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Be careful. It's dangerous. Big fire thing."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. What did you say?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Big fire thing."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, how do you make him go back to sleep?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Don't let him know you came."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Tell you what, Lohkor. Will you hold his leash, please?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sure!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to fly! I know exactly how to do it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You cast it on yourself. It's a concentration for I believe up to an hour?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ten minutes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten minutes. Even better.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sure, yeah, I'm going to fly. And I'm going to try to go over to that little alcove and see what happens.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So you watch as the tiny gnome suddenly takes off and begins gliding across the roof of this magma area.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I'm giving the creature a wide berth.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Look, Laura, you're finally doing it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're doing it, you watch as the magma rager stares and tracks her as she goes. And as you head across the way, it shifts to the very edge of the platform, almost tensing at the border and watches as you slowly descend towards this platform. As you come down, make a perception check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just hoping for help or trying to find a way off, and eventually, they expired.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm sorry you had a tragic ending. I'm going to keep flying around them. I don't want to touch my feet to the ground, in case something comes out of the ground. But I'm going to dig through all of their shit and see what I can find.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wow. One.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Goodbye.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Glancing through, most of it falls apart as you grasp it. The armor crumples and falls apart as you touch the armor. The only thing that catches your attention because it is the one piece of equipment that is shining amongst the rest, is in one of the sheaths. There is a blade, that as you pull it out, it's got this beautifully wicked metal that curves into a point at the end, like a forked point. It's got a bit of an energy pulse gem in the center of where the hilt is. And as you reach over to look at it, it looks pristine untouched by time. (burps) Pardon me! A little effervescent tonight, apparently! The soot wipes off of it cleanly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I hold it aloft. I found a weapon. I'll bring it back over to you guys.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I also talk to you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, Aluneth does whisper and say "You've already found a weapon. This is of no use "to you."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm not going to keep it. I'm going to give it away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as, coasting over, blade forth, the magma rager still tensing against the edge as she flies overhead.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I wave it towards the creature as I fly by, but I don't get close enough to really do anything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Greldamine finally lands on the ground, presenting the blade.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What kind of blade? How big is this thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a longsword. It's big for a longsword, but it does technically act as a longsword.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Which one of you would like this beautiful blade?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I would like to see it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would also, but I would do roshambo with you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Best out of three, or just one time?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: One time. Throw on four.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: On four?! I have intelligence of eight.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Throw on three.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Throw on three?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Throw on one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: One, two, shoot! Give me that shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a very fine blade.

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: What's the name of her sword again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Aluneth.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a staff.

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: Sorry. Does Aluneth have anything to say about where we are?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh mighty Aluneth, do you have anything to say about where we are?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You seem very crazy right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It talks, I swear.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The voice comes back in from the aether. "I do despise these subterranean regions. I don't "recognize where we are. This world has changed quite a bit since I last walked its surface."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: How long since you walked its surface?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's very ancient.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Of course you have. I don't know, generations."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Long time.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Could you fly over to the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you wish to attune to the weapon?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hell yeah. I am attuned to nothing, so I will attune to this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You want me to go over to the collapse?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, lead the creature over to that section.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, okay! I'm going to fly over to the collapsed area, because I've still got a little time left, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you coast over to the collapsed area.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I land. Now what do you want me to do?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to try and cast Hold Person on the creature.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, I'll wave my arms so he walks toward me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an intelligence check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: God, it won't work on him, will it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so the creature heads over and it's focused on you. What'd you get?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I got 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20. You get the sense that Hold Person mainly affects small humanoid creatures. A large elemental like this would not be held by a spell.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is an elemental considered a monster?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's considered a monster.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Creature, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you discovered your weapon.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This weirdly pristine longsword is encased in meticulous, almost gaudy, gold scrolling and rune-like carvings that spell out phrases like, "Carpe Diem", like your shirt with donut, and "You only live once." You gain plus two to all attacks and damage rolls made with this weapon. You are immune to fear and, if you ever attempt to flee from danger, you must make a wisdom saving throw, DC 12. On a failure, you instead rush toward the challenge in hopes of glory. YOLO!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes! That's a great item!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's Adventurefury, Blessed Blade of the Thrillseeker.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh my god! Damn!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is that an actual blade in the game?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (chuckling) No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Please make it an actual weapon in the game.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's an inside joke.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: For Argus and for LRJenkins1234.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I could try to stun him if we all wanted to make a break for one side or the other. I'm not sure if it would work, so, any other ideas?

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: Which side?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Straight through, I think! I mean, that's what Reek said.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wasn't Reek lying?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No! He's very trustworthy.

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: I think there's something on the other side that we don't know. We need to know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I cast Zone of Truth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. What's your spell DC? Oh, 13, right? Nope.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yay!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Cheeker-- what's his name? Oh, right, Reek.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Reeksus."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you really know the way back to Tagwaggle?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I do, yes!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Which direction is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That would be (straining) right!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He lied to me!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He did. I'm sure it's nothing personal, though!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm bad with directions!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's telling the truth! Do you like us? Aww. Do you like me?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, he has to answer.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I endure you!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll take it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I endure you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey, Shakira, do you fear me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (panicked wimper)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Good, that's all that matters. Let's go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think I'm running out of my ten minutes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're getting down to the last couple of minutes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I need to stand up and I need to fly away from this place, or else I'm going to be stranded on this side!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can land wherever we need to be.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, that's what I'm going to do, but I want to fly around to the other side.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you coast around to this platform over here and land on the opposite side of the bridge. The magma rager spins and is flexing in the direction of where you are.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: While the Zone of Truth is still active, Bundle, what are you the most afraid of?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh! That's a 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Answer as you feel.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not you. Not even a little. You're so soft and squishy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, see, if it was a spider, then I could take care of it for you. I don't want to leave you in an awkward situation.

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: Should we leave you two alone?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, you only live once.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What are you going to do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to make a run for it. Fuck it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's your strength?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: My strength is 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16? That's easy enough for you. You run and leap, big dwarven strong legs. You leap across. You land on the center platform, at which point the magma rager turns to face you. What are you doing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to cast Sacred Flame, which I know will do very little on him, but it might temporarily irritate him. I'm going to run the opposite direction.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, Sacred Flame. So he makes a dexterity saving throw. No, it's an action to do that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, it's an action to do that? Should I burn my action running?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To dash? You can, if you want to. Okay, you go running as it goes charging toward you. It's going to go ahead and attempt to make a charge-slam attack. That is going to be a 23 to hit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh my god, yeah, that hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Double ones on the attack, so only six points of bludgeoning damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can live with that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Six points of fire damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can live with that too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As it slams into you, you immediately get pushed 15 feet back into the air. You arc backwards. As you're falling back, you can look, you're edging toward where the central platform where you were before you go to the middle one, and off to the side where the lava is. Go ahead and make an acrobatics check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: God, if I have to do an action, I hope I can get an action before this happens. Acrobatics check, oh god.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why'd you give the Snitch back?!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Because I'm an idiot! 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20? You barely manage to catch yourself on the edge and roll back up (straining) onto the platform. The magma rager is right there staring at you, its burning coal magma eyes angrily staring at your dwarven form.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So where am I now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are now currently right here in the center, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, he ran backwards?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He slammed into him as he ran toward him and pushed him back onto the middle platform. At least he didn't fall in.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I have an idea. Is he considered fighting us right now, or is he just staring?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, in theory, it can't seemingly do anything at you from range, so he's waiting for somebody to come to his platform. If you decide to then assault him on the middle platform, there'd be an initiative roll. But right now it doesn't seem to have any means of attacking at range.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, then I'm going to cast Charm Monster on the creature.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So this is your 4th-level?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It rolled a four, so it does not succeed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Woo! You love us! We're really great! Let us pass!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as its intense expression toward the dwarf slackens and it flexes its shoulders and then roils back to the center platform and then looks over toward you with a nod.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Your mama loves you very much. Your papa's very proud of you. Come on, you guys.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Doesn't seem so scary! Across.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's your strength?

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: Ah, zero. Or ten, sorry, ten.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nobody attack him, guys. If anybody touches him, this is going to break.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so the three of you make it across fine without any issue. Go ahead and make an acrobatics check for me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 20. Natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll let that go for all of them. With a natural 20, seeing this happen and watching them all dart across, you begin to do hand-over-feet, full-on handspring-style leaping over the platforms past the rager. You all make it over to the side platform, meeting up with your mage friend as the magma rager's still sitting there, resting in the center, looking toward you for some sort of an order.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I did have Reeksus with me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (screeching) (impact) He's being dragged and slammed like some horrible, slow-motion yo-yo.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I did a quick Cure Wounds back to 41.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you talk, magma monster?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear it emitting some sort of sound, but it sounds like a heavy bonfire and rocks banging together.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Friends dance with each other. We should dance.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as you step up to the edge of the platform, begin to gnome-dance, the rager--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is it the Warcraft dancing animation?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's this large elemental covered in armor that's pseudo-getting down with this tiny mage gnome on the edge of the platform as the lava glows from underneath, uplighting him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I guess we can go, you guys. See you later.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you walk away, it slowly stops dancing and goes back to rest in the center of the platform. All righty, that was a unique solution.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Reeksus, now that your lies are through, lead the way. Quietly!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We are problem solvers!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Quietly is the key here! Shh!"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Aw, I don't feel bad. Why is that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Big thing lives ahead!"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not Toddlewaddle? Something else?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Togwaggle beyond. This is big dragon!"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What did you say?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Dragon!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have actually not gone up against a dragon. I just want to put that out there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They're not bad. Well, I mean, I hear they're not bad.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Have you ever seen a dragon in person?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, no. I mean, well, no. Well, no.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Reeksus, one dragon? Just one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "One dragon. Not too bad for you, right?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Have you ever seen a dragon?

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: Yes. Well, my grandfather, he told me tales of them, yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: We choose the shadows in the presence of dragons.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes, let's stealth for a minute.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys press down through the darkened grade, the heat subsides slightly. You feel the breeze now, this pulsing breeze through the tunnel, rhythmic almost, as you turn into an open cavern, a magnificent natural pocket of geodes and crystals, beautiful blue and green crystals refracting patches of luminous fungus into these faint kaleidoscopes that permeate the entirety of this entryway. There's a visible exit across the chamber and slightly to the left, where you can see in the middle is a glittering mass, piles upon piles of gold coins, punctuated by gems of all colors peeking through this hoard. As you enter and look about, it is more money than any of you have ever seen. There atop this mound, you see lying the gargantuan, curled form of a sleeping red dragon, arms crossed, head resting there, (snoring).

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: Creature hasn't acted in combat yet?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, but I have to share. Speaking in accent, but out of game. As a former rogue, boo-hoo, this one is asking me if assassinate is good in this moment to get a special surprise attack on gargantuan-sized dragon. Yes.

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: He doesn't know I'm here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's true.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is she asking Quazi, or is she asking Vax?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You would almost definitely hit dragon, but it would be like taking donut and hitting side of Empire State Building. Absolutely you will hit, absolutely. You will take off half of one scale of dragon. I mean, you can do it. This is Dungeons & Dragons. Do whatever you like, but I'm just saying, the game will end in two minutes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Technically, it's Kobolds & Catacombs.

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: Point made.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's still sleeping. What else do we see in this--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. With advantage still? Blue fungus still?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're a fun guy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you, Taliesin. 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Various pieces of art that are scattered in this horde. What does catch your eye is there is a beautiful, jagged-looking dagger with a series of red gems across the blade, a chain affixed to its pommel that is currently resting partially jammed underneath one of the hands of the sleeping dragon.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Tempting, tempting.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I bet he's a heavy sleeper.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes. If anyone's going to fuck with that shit, it's going to be you, but it's still a big if.

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: I'm in.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I also have a question about this item that I'm attuned to. Let's say that this one's not crazy enough to grab dagger and we just want to go by. This says that, if you ever attempt to flee from danger, you make wisdom save. Does sneaking by--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Avoiding is different than fleeing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I just wanted to triple check. Part of me thinks it would be hilarious to see me rush in, but--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, believe me, part of me thinks it'd be hilarious, too. But distinctive; fleeing is different. If the dragon were to be awakened and engage you, it might be a different deal, but slaying a sleeping creature is no glory.

lines.name: LIAM, MATT
lines.text: YOLO.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are there any other exits out of this room?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Currently, from what you view, no. The rest of the chamber appears to be the home to where this dragon is. You do not see an exit and it seems strange that a dragon of this size would find its way in or out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not to be a stickler for our contract, but do we see any candles?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looking around with your perception bit, you glance around, and you can see there is a trail of flecks of wax that lead across the left side of the chamber into the exit where it goes. So it looks like whatever has been transporting the mass of candles went that direction.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Great, there's the exit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to start making my way that direction no matter what.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sneaking, sneaking. As stealthy as possible.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Who's sneaking first?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a stealth check, please.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's all right. 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Who's next?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I elbow the gnome and lip sync, and I say,

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, no.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't do it! Okay. Are you going? Okay, I'm going to try to go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, make a stealth check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You all need to go through because, you know, I'm so big and heavy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Once you're through, and then she's got to go last because she's going to try and steal that dagger.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What'd you roll?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13, okay. As you slowly make your way through, there's a slight shift to the dragon's neck position as it turns (snorting). One eye slightly opens and you watch as the interior secondary lid flicks a little bit and a voice, (grunting). And it instinctually lobs out a jet of flame in your direction. I need you to make a dexterity saving throw, please.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ten!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a lot of dice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take 38 points of fire damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I'm unconscious! Oh wait, no. Okay, wait, let me do my math because I have my Mage Armor up, which means that my Arcane Ward is active, which means I have 19 hit points on my ward.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which it takes those off first. Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, so that means there's, how many? 38 minus 19. So 19 left. So I'm still alive!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So the dragon, after snorting haphazardly in a brief moment of being roused from its slumber, its dream, it goes back to sleep as the jet of flame subsides. You look over and see this, what once was a tightly- and well-placed-together bun, is now a singed mat of scraggled gnome hair as the mage stands there, covered in soot, little bits of fire burning off the edge of the cloak-robe.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to throw a Cure Wounds at that to help with that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to stealthily run toward him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You catch up with Bundle as he goes ahead and heals. Go ahead and roll for that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You get 11 points back to help.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, who's next?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a stealth check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Clang, shink! Your foot hits a small pot on the ground, which breaks and shatters at the impact of your armored foot. (grunting and whooshing) Make a dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nope! Five again!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let the dice hit the floor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 35 points of fire damage.

lines.name: LARUA
lines.text: Oh jeez! Are you alive?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're like, (gasping).

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, can I--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you still holding the rope that connects?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, I was, wasn't I? I still had Reek.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, the rope is burned off now. Reeks, while still bound, doesn't have a tether.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I would like to. And can I Lay on Hands, dump the rest of my hit point pool into--? Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And so the three of you are across now. It's just the two of you and Reeksus.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. So you want to try to tangle with the devil and try to take this blade?

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: I do, I do.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hm. And what is the landscape like from where they are to where we are, here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It looks like most of it is either a small, maybe eight- to ten-foot-wide walkway with bits of furniture and gold that are pressed over there, and a few small pillars that have nothing resting on them at the moment, and along the curved wall where everyone has been stealthing around. The rest of the chamber is filled by hoard pile and the dragon.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Here's what I think. If I fucking move, big noise, jig is blown. You need me to stay still. So you do your thing and if it goes well, you go and then I go. If things go bad, we all die together.

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: Things go bad, can you run while I distract him with my things going bad?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You know, no promises. We'll see what happens. Good luck.

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: Here goes nothing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Stealth check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Stealth, oh. It's a one. Does she have--? She does not. Does she have what I had?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you talking about Reliable Talent? That's a much higher level skill, unfortunately.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, too bad, so sad.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as you approach and grab the base of the dagger, you slowly climb up the coins and get your hand around the hilt. As you tug, it's caught on something. You're like, no, I don't know if this is worth it. You pull again. It's caught on something. Eventually, it comes free. Whew. You glance up and watch as this large, yellow eye is looking right down at you as a deep voice begins to vibrate the ground. The coins jangle at the sheer bass of its intensity. "Might I ask what "you're doing?"

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: I thought it was stuck in your hand. I thought I would help.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, allow me to help you." The arms suddenly reach out and grab as it lifts its torso back. Its head retracts as it inhales.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Power Word Shield.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you're using Power Word Shield on her? Go ahead and roll up for that. You guys are over there. What are you doing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: LRJenkins1234!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you guys doing? This large dragon is now rearing back. What are you doing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Running forward.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I need everyone to roll initiative.

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: 16 temporary hit points? What does that mean?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It means add 16 that you're about to probably lose.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So you're there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But this is where you're at isn't it? Or is that where you're at?

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: No, I'm right here, that's where I'm at.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You shouldn't be there because you can't go higher than that so now you add 16

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right so, initiative everyone. 25 to 20?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 24. Oh shit, that was Vax's voice.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, it was!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Seven.

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: Do I roll for that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you do. Roll initiative.

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: Oh god, four. You're done.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Four plus--? What's your initiative modifier there?

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: Initiative, my initiative is--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Five plus whatever you roll.

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: Nine. It's not going very well is it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is going to go very badly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What did you get Bundle?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ooh.

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: YOLO?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have candles to get!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, top of the round is you. Quazirat. Are you running to meet up with the rest of the party?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, maybe I could.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a small tunnel that everyone else is standing at.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nah, I'm going to dragon. Yeah. First one is 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Of course not. Second one is 25.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25 hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, it does. Okay so that is big damage, 16!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16 points of damage as you strike, arching your Adventurefury Blessed Blade of the Thrill Seeker across the chest of the red dragon. It scrapes through and you see a little trickle of blood begin to spill from the little bit of scales that you carved through. It's still inhaling and seems to not even notice your presence.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh buddy. Let's go!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that ends your turn. Greldamine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to hide and not fight a dragon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you're retreating into the hallway and hiding?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You run deeper into the hallway. Are you trying to make a hide action?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a stealth check. So you disappear into the (screaming), into the cavern.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I didn't stealth very well. Seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, Lohkor.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I run forward with my warhammer and I'm going to take two attacks and I'm going to dump Divine Smite into both of them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Smite. 22 for the first one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And 16 for the second one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Does not hit. So you don't dump the second one, once you hit you Divine Smite. So you didn't lose any spells.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. 13 plus-- what's Divine Smite? There it is. 2d8. 25 points of radiant damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice. So as you run forward

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes, it does.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. The dragon rears back and releases an entire burst of fire breath towards all of you except for you. You're just out of range because you ran. Everyone else, make a dexterity saving throw, please.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You have plus two because you're near me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What did you get, what is that?

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: One.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's seven plus your dex but it's still not great.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Everybody rolled shit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You get a plus two, Liam.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's not bad.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What did you roll?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 22 total.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You take 24 points of fire damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ain't no thing but the chicken wing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You failed on the save, but you still take half because of your evasion so you also take 24 points of fire damage.

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you for that cold resistance by the way, that's really cool of you to put on this character.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Dude, dwarves have frost resistance in Warcraft, I'm sorry.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know, bring it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What did you roll on your--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ten here as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you take 48 points of fire damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Me too.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as both of them fall to the ground unconscious--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, they're the only two that can bring our people back!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've got a healing potion.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I do.

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: (laughter and yelling)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With your time traveling, as minor as it may be, when you're facing death in the face here and you don't see much of a chance of victory at this point--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So these two are down?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends the dragon's turn. Aerwin, it's your turn.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Get the hell out of dodge.

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: We have to get them out, we have to get everyone out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tell them you're sorry.

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) You have two allies currently on the ground. One that's right next to you which is your big friend and--

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: I need to help him. What do I have that can help them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can try to grab and drag them if you want to.

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: I'm going to grab and drag them.

lines.name: MATT

So you're dragging him through. You get him right to the edge of the cavern using your movement and action pulling him over there. The dragon's going to take one swipe at you as an attack of opportunity. Oh that is a 13. What's your armor class?

So you go running, you get up to Bundle's body, drag him the rest of the way so now you have both their bodies at the edge of the cavern entrance, the flames starting to curl in this area. As the head begins to push its way into the cavern behind you, the impact, the cavern shaking, you two who are running the fastest notice before anyone else does, the ground gives out beneath you. You both go into a freefall as the strength of the ground dissipates beneath your form. The rest of you see this happen just as you reach the edge and you watch as the tunnel is falling and collapsing beneath you as you all begin to tumble down into darkness. Right as that gout of fire is released, you watch above you as you spin into shadow, the flames completely engulf the cavern where you once were. Strangely, the collapse saved you! As you plummet down, whack! I need everyone to make an acrobatics check to see if you can manage to lessen the impact of the fall.

Once commissioned by the orc warlock Gul'dan for his assassin Garona, this blade has seen many a death at its hands. One of a pair, the other has been lost to time. You gain +3 to all attack and damage rolls made with this weapon. When you hit an enemy, they suffer an extra 1d8 poison damage and make constitution save (DC 14) or become poisoned until the end of your next turn.

Beyond it, you can see a flickering, orange glow. As you approach and glance up the side, make a perception check, whoever is at the front of that.

lines.text: As you come to the edge and you glance past the first few rows of wax and candle mounds, you can see in the distance a number of piles of collected unlit candles that line the walls. To the back of this 30-foot diameter chamber, a large lump wax throne stands, crowned with a dozen wide candles all flickering as they wreathe a sitting, larger, more rotund than average kobold, wearing leather armor that cannot seem to contain his bulging belly, now freed from the bursting leather plates around his torso. A white, wild chinstrap beard marks his chin line, as a large metallic crown of cobbled golds, silvers, and iron adorn his head, fused with a tall window lantern that shines brighter than a lantern should. You see shifting movement from within the lantern, like the light source seems to be moving of its own accord, almost alive. A smaller, elderly kobold stands next to this wax throne with a tiny violin, and he's playing music as the kobold king sitting on the throne has his eyes partially closed, listening. You see, through the shadows of the flickering candlelight, amongst the various piles beyond your vision, apparently other kobolds are also in the chamber rummaging around, moving, organizing, placing goods they've received. That's what you see.

lines.text: This earthquake has made me ever so nervous." Do you take your shot? You have advantage on your attack, so you get to roll twice.

lines.text: That definitely hits, go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: LIAM

lines.text: (choking) It reaches up and turns as you release the Fireball into the room. The violinist starts playing again, looks back and barely pulls the bow away and goes, "Oh no!" as the entire room bursts into flame. Go ahead and roll your 8d6 damage.

lines.text: And the violinist is ashes. As the flames subside, you watch as there's a kobold shaped skeleton clutching a now burning violin that tumbles into a pile on the ground. At which point, the other kobolds jump out, damaged and burning looking to King Togwaggle as he's sitting there, the edges of his chin beard burning and curled up. He has this giant shovel that he has resting at his side. And he glances up at his crown and goes "Rakanishu, it looks like company we has. And You! No! Take! "Candle!" Slams the shovel onto the ground and stands up. Everyone roll initiative.

lines.text: All righty. Wow, okay. So, 25 to 20, anybody?

lines.text: All righty. Then 20 to 15?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Greldamine, you're up first. You finished shooting the fireball, they're all now pulling out pickaxes and going (yelling) and they're all turning. They can see you and they can see you and the rest of you, currently now stuck in this hole in the wall right now. You're all locked in this pincered position.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's go, wee one.

lines.text: The one syllable protest!

lines.text: Their pickaxes tumble off and some are stuck into the stonework. Surrounding, beginning to melt wax elements have now melted even further and are now beginning to coat the ground with soft molten wax. The entire chamber is now becoming a sticky wax base.

lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a giant, hexagonal, circular chamber, and the small crack in the wall where you guys were hiding.

lines.name: LAURA

lines.text: Yes. Except for you, you're actually outside of it and by one of the mounds that is slowly melting in front of you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't have any action to do a hide check, unfortunately. Using it for cover, hopefully. That ends your turn. Bundle, you're up.

lines.name: ALL
