lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Make a ranged spell attack against King Togwaggle.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Here we go, Guiding Bolt. That's a 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Guiding Bolt is a 25.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That'll hit, go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's 4d6 radiant. Ooh! 16 points of radiant damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, and the next hit against him has advantage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, the next hit against him has advantage, and yeah, I'm going to give myself a quick Healing Word as a bonus action because I'm really low.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As a reaction, King Togwaggle's going to go ahead and use Vengeance of Rakanishu. After the Guiding Bolt slams into King Togwaggle, he lifts up his giant shovel in his hand and you watch as the interior of the lantern crown that he has begins to brighten and suddenly your chest bursts into flame. You suffer 14 points of fire damage and you are considered on fire. Until you spend an action to put it out, you're going to take 1d6 fire damage every turn.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. I am at 29 points of health, that's okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty, so that ends your turn?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Four kobolds start rushing out into the center of the chamber, their feet getting stuck in the wax, so they'll only be able to move at half their speed so they can't get up to anybody. They take their pickaxes and throw them! So they're going to throw three at you and three at you. Technically you guys would both have a little bit of cover because you're behind those, so I'd give a plus two to your AC for each of you. So the first three against you. That is going to be a 16, what's your armor class?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I did Mage Armor, so I've got 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You suffer nine points of piercing damage as one pickaxe hits you in the chest, clavicle area, you're like (grunt). The third one's going to throw and that is a 19.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you take seven points piercing damage from a second pickaxe that jams you in like the hip area, it falls out, but the wound's open. The three against you. That's going to be a 15 plus four, that's 19?

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: I'm 17, I don't have any pluses, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Plus two!

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: Okay, so 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It hurts, you can feel the welt picking up. Second one is going to go ahead and strike you, that is going to be an 11. So, no. That one you dodge out of the way, and a third and final one is going to come for you. That is a natural 20! As you dodge out of the way and come around, there is one that takes both hands (grunt) (whooshing) and as you spin around to hear the scream it hits you right in the forehead. That's a six, that's 12, plus three. You take 15 points of piercing damage as your head is ringing from the impact of the pickaxe. Your vision blurs and doubles for a second as you right yourself and clutch onto the soft wax. You fall into a little bit, and pull yourself out. That's going to end the kobolds' turn, now it's King Togwaggle's turn. King Togwaggle is going to rush forward, currently it's only the three of you visible because nobody's come out of the chamber yet. So he's going to rush forward and get between the two of you and make a shovel strike on each of you. So the first one against you, that's a 27.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I rolled a natural 19. You take--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's at disadvantage though, because I'm a gnome. I'm very small.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits you. That's an eight plus six, that's 14 points of bludgeoning damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (groans)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ending their turn, it now comes to you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I push out of the crevice and run at King Togwaggle?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You push out and he's right there. You guys are all clustered right on the outside so he's easily within range.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I can get right on him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I use my Hammer of Justice, "Target a creature within 15 feet of you to make a "constitution saving throw against your spell save DC or become stunned until the next round" on my next turn?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's your--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 13! Yes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as you step out of the crevice, you summon the radiant energy granted to you from the divine, and you watch as this giant radiant hammer, summoned from the sky, slams down and strikes the top of King Togwaggle's head. The crown goes off to the side for a second and he's like (grunting). He can't make words, his bell is rung. So he's stunned until the end of your next turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that's your action. You're there and you're up engaged with him. That finishes your turn. All right, you're up, Aerwin.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: With stunned, if you hit him does it break the stun? Or he's--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, he's stunned, and attacks against him have advantage and melee attacks against him I'll double check, I'm pretty sure auto-crit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do I get a bonus action with that crazy move or is that it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do, if you want to use a bonus action.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I want to pour some Searing Smite into it as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll let you do that, sure. Well, it's not a melee weapon attack, I think, unfortunately.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh that's right, never mind. That's what it is, your call.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Stunned, incapacitated. Yep, so as an incapacitated creature, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So you guys, melee attacks are auto-crits on him right now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, and your buddy is there so--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Dagger, dagger, dagger!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not hidden, can't do that, but you're still going to get sneak attack.

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: Dagger, I want to do the dagger.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, you're going for an attack. Is she at advantage because he's stunned and weird?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's an auto-crit!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So roll twice. Oh auto-crit, so you don't even have to roll.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah you do, you have to roll to see if it hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, yeah you hit, 16 plus eight, so 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 24 definitely hits. I'm checking to make sure I do this right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So you roll--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Roll these guys. Okay, roll those.

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: Okay, all right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Holy shit, that's a good sneak attack.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 22, wait, you double it, because it's an auto-crit, so 22, 44 plus the three, is 47.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Plus the poison damage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus a d8, which is doubled because it's an auto-crit, so roll a d8.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, you have smoked this guy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, that one, that one.

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: Five.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jesus, 57 points?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So using the dagger you mustered from beneath the dragon, you jam it right up into the abdomen of King Togwaggle and while stunned he goes (choking) and you watch as some of his brackish blood (splattering) out of his mouth. He looks hurt, but is very angry. While still stunned in place, his eyes have locked in on you. You can see the bloodshot look behind the whites. He goes, "No. Take. Candle." Is that your turn?

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: Is that the end of my turn? That's the end of my turn.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, you can disengage as bonus action and get away from him so he can't hurt you.

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: I'll do that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Dance back.

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: I'll dance back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's stunned, he can't even attack her. So you move away from him. All right, so you pull away, pulling the blade out from the wound which now is like (dripping sound). Ending your turn, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How far away are other little guys from this one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're about ten feet behind him, in the center.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ten feet behind him? Then I will use my whirlwind warrior class ability, and I will start with the big man and move to his little buddies.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay? So here we go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as an action you can make an attack against each creature that you come adjacent to.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So I'll start with him, yeah? So I get two attacks because of who I am, that is 16? Not great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't get two attacks of part of this, you get one attack against each thing you go across.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you get one attack on him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So am I at advantage because he's fucked up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay good. That's better, that's 24 to hit, that hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits, go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, here we go again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And I'll say with your movement, moving through you can hit four of the six kobolds.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay great. 14 on this guy. Keep going?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you're shifting on and you watch as Quazirat suddenly grabs his blade and begins spinning in a circle. You guys have to duck out of the way as he carves into King Togwaggle, carves through a bunch of the wax and begins burning into the center of the chamber and cleaves through, hopefully, four of these kobolds.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ever hear of Baryshnikov? Amateur. Do I roll for attack on each one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you do.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, here we go. First one, we get 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Second one, we get natural 20. Third one we get one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fourth one we get 28.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Three of them hit, one of them is a critical.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, so first one we get 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18 damage?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (squeal)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, so second one critical so eight, 16, 18, 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That one, the blade bisects him from hip to chest and he stumbles forward to the ground in two pieces.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh buddy. And the last one, 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14. That one the blade stops in his body and he's like (choking) "Why?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Life comes at you fast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (growling) All right. That ends your turn.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sure does.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Greldamine, your turn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to try and take his crown off his head since he's stunned.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, what are you going to do, are you going to grab and pull it off?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh wait, no! Can I use Mage Hand to do it? Is that what Mage Hand does?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you want to do that roll an athletics check. Sorry, not an athletics, an arcana check to see if you can manage to pull it off.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15. You watch as the crown comes off and is now floating there as you're holding it with the Mage Hand.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I got his crown! I'm going to run across the room with the Mage Hand following behind me and start trying to bury it in wax on the other side of the room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you're holding it in the air and trying to dig a hole in the soft wax?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That will end your turn, Bundle, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's going to take an action to put myself out, I assume.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you want to put yourself out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would like to put myself out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At top of the round, you do take three points of fire damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Stop, drop and roll.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You spend the round (yelping), putting the fire out on you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do I get a bonus action?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So for a bonus action I'm going to cast Spiritual Weapon at 4th-level, because I think that gives me an extra d8 for spiritual weapon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It does, yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, so I'm going to cast Spiritual Weapon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And what are you summoning?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I basically want to summon what is basically a big chomping mouse trap.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughing) All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to take a whack at the king's head with a giant--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A divine mouse trap. It's beautifully carved, from ivory it looks like. The silver snapping mechanism, it looks like it was of elven make. It has filigree on it. As it appears you hear this chorus go (angelic singing) as it prepares itself.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does it auto-crit, if it hits?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's advantage on the attack and I think it'll be an auto-crit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, it's also advantage on the attack. I rolled a 17 plus--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well you could get a 20.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, 23, but it's an auto-crit anyway.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Isn't it? It's an auto-crit?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's still stunned. So that's 26 points of damage. (snapping)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as it snaps down and more blood spills out. And you hear the snapping of a bone and one eye closes in pain. He's still standing there and is furiously awaiting his return.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to back up a bit, with my movement. And get a little bit of cover.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The four kobolds see you running by with the crown gliding. They go "No! Rakanishu! Save it!" and they all throw all their pickaxes at you. That is 12? Misses you. First one hits soft wax. Second one is a 24.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a concentration check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, what a concentration check for the Mage Hand? Okay!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll find out real fast here. No, it's not concentration, it lasts for a minute.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay good!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just lasts for a minute. So that one you took the damage. Third one, that's going to be a 17 plus four, that's a 21.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's seven points of piercing damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I turn and look at it right as it hits me in the face and knocks me out cold.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh it does?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (screams)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You fall to the ground and the axe (pinging). There's a little trickle of blood down your forehead as you hit the soft wax, which does soften your blow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, it cracks my glasses.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It does, one side is now shattered in a spiderweb, as the crown clatters to the ground. As it does the glass of the lantern breaks. All right, that's the end of the kobolds' turn. Your turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: My turn?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hold real still for me (whoosh). Two big attacks with the warhammer. I'm going to dump Searing Smite into the second one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Advantage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh advantage, that's right. I mean they're crits, aren't they?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So 18 to hit. 12 points of damage on the first one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, it's a crit. Double it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh yeah. 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Whatever the dice was you double.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, oh I'm sorry, right. So 14 plus five. 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19, all right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 21. 21 again, and I'm dumping Searing Smite into it. He does a constitution--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, sorry, what'd I say?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 19 again, you said 21.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh damn it. (laughing) Sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How do you want to do this? (cheering)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Coming under his chin, trying to change the way his pretty face looks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The second strike, as you hit the jaw slams upward. You see teeth shatter from the sheer force of the impact. As the jaw slowly falls slack, both eyes are cross eyed, the forehead is pushed inward, and he gurgles before falling onto his back, onto the ground. Unconscious. And bleeding horribly. All right, that end your turn?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, at the end of your turn you glance over and you notice the mage is down and you watch the shattered lantern-- suddenly flames are beginning to emerge and swirl. You see all the nearby candle wicks that have been slowly burning away from the heat of the room, the flames are almost being drawn from the candles towards this lantern and this flame that is growing in the center. And you see all the kobolds are now going, "Rakanishu, Rakanishu, Rakanishu." That ends your turn. Aerwin, you're up.

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: We need to get to safety for a minute, and get everybody healed I think.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have two outs here, there latrine room, and there is the crack where you were in.

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: Latrine room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You go darting for the latrine room?

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is a rickety wooden commode series, three of these nasty looking, supposed to look nice but aren't really nice at all kobold toilets. Even dangerous to sit in, they look like they have shards of wood and nails, jagged up. There is a rushing underground river that vanishes through a far wall. It looks like it's set up with the bars to be almost like a bathing apparatus.

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: (sighs) Man. Rushing river, bathing apparatus. Can I duck in there to hide?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could certainly try.

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: I'm going to duck in there and hide for a minute to get out of danger.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you get into the water and you get down into the rushing water. It's a pretty strong current.

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you can hold onto one of the rails there, that can hold you in place. Okay, so you're there, keeping low in the water.

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: Do I have any more rope left? No I used it. I could tie myself up to rest for a minute? No, I'll just sit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You've got six seconds, that's what your turn is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that brings us then to Quazirat.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Right I see the little one go down, so I start hoofing it in that direction and I plant my hand right down on her little forehead and I use Gift of the Naaru. And you get seven hit points of life.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yay, I'm alive!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But then I keep running past her as far as I can go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you do that, you rush past, go to heal her. Two of the kobolds that you struck last turn that are in melee range with you swing out with their reactions to take an attack of opportunity.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's fine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sure, that hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Other one. Oh that's a natural one. He swings wide. You rush forward, between the two other kobolds, intending to get to her, heal her, and then continue to run. Which direction?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Towards the latrine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you go darting towards the latrine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Which is technically fleeing, so do I need to make saving throw with sword?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You would.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay good. No. That's not good. That's a four. YOLO.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Adventurefury: Blessed Blade of the Thrill Seeker calls to you. And this day, glory must be found! YOLO, motherfucker.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Bozhe moi!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But am I out of movement and I'm stuck where I am?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've healed her and then you spin around, blade ready, and you're going to fight these kobolds and whatever that fire thing is that's growing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, I am.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Electric guitar in the background. (guitar solo)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I take the sword. (guitar solo)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, Greldamine. You come to consciousness and watch as your friend spins around with his giant blade and start laughing in this face of this-- now you notice, swelling elemental entity that is drawing fire from all of the candles in the room and is growing by the moment.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to use Frost Nova and try to target the fire element and the other little things that are in the room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can hit all the kobolds. All right, so roll 3d6 cold damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh. 15.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Constitution saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sorry about that, microphone. And they have to make a constitution?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Constitution.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For the kobolds, what is the DC on that one? Your spell DC?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: My spell DC is 16. Oh, did it go up? No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you watch, first off, Rakanishu takes double damage for that. Takes 30 points of cold damage being vulnerable to the cold. You watch as the fire entity (freezing sounds). The flames slightly flicker and pull in there, and the ice that's encased around it seems to create this orb or sphere that's holding it in place. The source of the fire that's drawing towards it seems to be temporarily cut off and all but one kobold are all locked by ice. One seems to break forth (growling and snorting) "My candles now!" All right, does that end your turn or do you-- you can still move.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to move, I'm going to run towards the latrine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Half your movement to get up from prone because you were unconscious. So you can get about ten to 12 feet. You rush over, you're about maybe ten feet away from it. But you're making your way as best you can!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are there any candles around?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are dozens of candles.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Still?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, I mean they seem softer and you can see clusters of them, but yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that ends your turn? That brings us to Bundle.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to Channel Divinity and quickly throw seven points of healing at everybody, and myself. Every little bit helps. I'm going to, just for fun, take a swing with the mousetrap at the giant flame beast to see what happens.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go ahead and roll an attack on that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a 14?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14? Unfortunately, as it goes to snap, it hits the ice that's encased around it and can't seem to break past. No effect.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to turn and run to the latrine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's going to be a 17 plus four. That's going to be a 21. You take five points of piercing damage. Are you still up?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The other two are going to begin throwing their pickaxes. They have a whole cluster of them in their bag, and they're throwing them as best as they can. One of them's going throw at you, and then one more, because one of them died, is going to throw at you. So against you, that's going to be a 14.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Misses! Sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Against you, that's going to be a 12. You guys are deflecting the pickaxes in the middle of the air. Ending their turn, it is now Rakanishu's turn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: At least he can't move, you guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And then as part of his attack, he's going to use his explode. (roars) And detonates in the chamber, 40-foot radius, so that's all of you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is that a dex save?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope. All of you ignite. No immediate damage, but you're all on fire. At the top of your round, you take 1d6 fire damage until you take an action or something to put the fire out. All right, so that's the end of Rakanishu's turn. It's your turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (pained noises) I run forward.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Top of your turn, you take six points of fire damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I run forward with two attacks from my warhammer against Rakanishu. That is 16?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Misses. You swing, and the flames seem to dodge out of it. You hit air, as it seems to be reforming its body to avoid the blows and then going back into its semi-solid fire form.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 23 hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think it's fire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That does nothing against a fire elemental.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That was so smart!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as the flames consume your hammer and it hits, it devours the fire from the hammer.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, cool. Good deal. All right, next!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter) You still do weapon damage on top of it, so roll that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It was ten points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Ten damage there. That ends your turn. That brings us to you, Aerwin.

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: I'm going to go after it with the kingslayer. Try to take it out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because you were low in the water, the flames, when they begin to take form on you and begin to engulf, you duck low and you would have probably been unaffected. Water puts out the flames. All right, so you let go of the pole, you rush back into the chamber. You cannot get quite close enough to hit him with a melee. You could throw the dagger, if you want to, or shoot it.

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: Oh, with the crossbow? Yes, I'm going to do the crossbow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so bolt in. Release it. Fire with the crossbow.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is Lohkor adjacent?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He is, yes, so you get sneak attack.

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: I'm going to add, because it's the dagger--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, you're doing the crossbow, you said. You can do the dagger.

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: It's the dagger in the crossbow.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You cannot fire it. You can throw the dagger, or you can fire the crossbow.

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: Throwing the dagger, so 30.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 30? That'll hit. Roll damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So 1d4. Roll the pyramid, then roll your four cubes. Add that all up.

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: Eight, 11, 13. 16. Plus poison.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No poison damage. The elemental is immune to poison, unfortunately. It's made of fire; there are no veins for the poison to affect. The dagger slams into the fiery torso, and you see a moment of resistance as the blade carves into the flames, then falls and clatters to the ground below it. It seems like it did some damage. But it doesn't seem to be reacting to the impact.

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: So now, I daggered him. Can I shortsword him?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, you can't do another attack. You can use a bonus action--

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: I'm going to back up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can dash back into the water, if you want to. So you go back to the water. Holding on there; the water's rushing below you. You can see the water as it's rushing in, it's disappearing into a small opening where the rest of the river is disappearing towards. That ends your turn. That brings us to Bundle.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: First thing I'm going to do is attack with the Spiritual Weapon, as my bonus action, so that's-- oh, that probably hit. 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hold onto that roll.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, so I'm on fire? Fuck it. I run, and I attack. I shout: For Argus! And I run forward to him, and I would like to attack-attack for my attack, but then also use my recovered action surge, so I'll hit this fucker three times. First one is good. Don't distract me! Is 29.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits. You take four points of fire damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fine. Is 17 for the next?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That misses.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. And last one-- oh, balls-- is 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20 hits, and you suffer ten fire damage from hitting him. You now see at the size that it's gotten, hitting it with a melee attack does fire damage to you by proximity.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's good shit, so here we go. First attack-- oh, that's terrible!-- for ten? Second attack that hits is 18, so a total of 28, all told.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 28, all told. Gotcha. Okay, so as you're slamming into it, the flames are burning your skin, and you're wincing, swinging as hard as you can, a few make purchase into its body, and you can see it carving away. It reacts a bit from the hits, but the giant jack-o-lantern fire grin continues to swell and grow with its physical size.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's all right. I hold my ground and block my friends.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, ending that, now it comes to top of the round. Your turn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are there any more kobolds alive?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are three of them, but they're on fire. It didn't distinguish. Everything caught fire in the room, and there are three kobolds going, (pained noises) as they're burning up. Rakanishu don't give a shit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, well, I'm going to cast Sleep at 2nd-level, so that gives me 7d8 worth of hit dice to knock people out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, roll that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Whoa. Sleep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (counting)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Don't act surprised, Travis. We know you're going to be a Sleep magician in the next campaign.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 34? Okay. You watch as the three screaming kobolds (screaming, snoring). Smoldering as they sleep on the ground. On fire. Really tired.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: For my movement, I'm going to run towards the latrine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're still on fire, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, and jump in the water.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You took four fire damage at the top of the round.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, and I'm going to jump in the water to put myself out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The flames go out as you dive into the water.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They look so innocent when they're asleep and on fire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Bundle, now it's your turn. Sorry. You can still take that attack if you want to.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 23 with the Spiritual Weapon to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Top of the turn, you still take six points of fire damage, as you're burning.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, that's fine. Let's hit this thing with the mousetrap again. Plus my spell attack bonus, so it's 16 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16 points of damage. As the giant divine trap snaps on, you watch as it snaps through one of the arms. The fire arm vanishes, as it seems to sever it at the shoulder, then it reforms afterward.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Then I'm going to use my second Channel Divinity: Preserve Life and put 30 points of health into you to keep you awake, and I'm going to take five for myself, then I'm going to run into the latrine, as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) They all quietly expire as they smolder in their sleep.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Live by the candle, die by the candle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so that finishes their turn. There are no more kobolds in this chamber. Rakanishu is now going to--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm in his grill.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's going to take two fire rakes at you. That is 26 to hit and 25 to hit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That almost doesn't hit, but it does.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take 18 points of fire damage from the first hit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Totally cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's 21 points of fire damage from the second hit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So 18 and 21? Cool. Let's find out what that does. I'm not down, but-- okay, cool. I'm up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, technically? Sorry, those should be an additional d6, because every round that he consumes fire, he increases the damage he deals, so an additional seven points of fire damage. All right, cool. That brings us to the end of Rakanishu's turn, who is going to begin shifting, using the movement, which gives you guys both an attack of opportunity. Is now moving towards the latrine, where everyone's rushing towards. Both of you guys get attacks of opportunity.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jesus! Nope.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both of you guys-- he's too fast, and both of you swing your weapons and actually hit in the middle of the air, and there's a spark, and you both "Damn it!" at each other. Up to the top. That brings us to Lohkor. Your turn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Lohkor.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, me! I run up behind and I hit it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hits. You take three points of fire damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yay. I rolled the wrong thing. Six points of damage. Second one. 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16 misses. It goes wide.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There you go. Cool. That's it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The hairs on your head are being singed off by being this close to the beast. All right, that's going to bring us to Aerwin, your turn.

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: I need to get my dagger back. I'm going to get my dagger back.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, you're picking it up instead of attacking? That's your call.

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: No, I want to attack. I want to attack! I'm going to use the crossbow, because that's what I have.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, roll for an attack.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Plus, what is it, seven?

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: Seven. 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15? You go to strike, and it barely misses it by a couple of inches and fires off into the distant room, unfortunately.

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: He's coming toward the latrine?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's coming in that direction, yeah.

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: I'm going to go around him to the other side to prepare to come after him again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Still inside the latrine?

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: I'm not in the latrine. I came out of the latrine to attack him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I thought you backed back into it, into the water.

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: End of the last turn, I went back in, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You threw it, then went back in.

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: I didn't have to come out to crossbow him, did I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not necessarily.

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: I came out to crossbow him, and then can I run across the chamber?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's going to be a 23 to hit. That is 15 points of fire damage to you as you run past.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, unconscious?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, she's up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends your turn. Quazirat, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think of my father, Leeron Jenkins, and I run.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I like Leeron Jenkins. Offshoot bloodline.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I run at him, and I attack again. Yeah, okay. First attack is okay. It's 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Second attack is a 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both hit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, first time, we get 18. Next one, 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, 18 and 16. All right. You also suffer nine points of fire damage from the two strikes, the flames beating into your face each time you hit him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is so cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, is that the end of your turn?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, it is. Still up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice. Yeah, it looks like it's taken a beating, but it's not looking super rough.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Next round, for sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now, your turn. Greldamine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: With my magic wand of missiles--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sorry! I have a bonus action. I'm going to use my Second Wind. Thank you. Go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How many times can you use Second Wind?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I recovered it. I used it once before, we took a short rest, and this is the last time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: With my magic wand of missiles, can I use all my charges?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to use all seven charges in the magic wand of missiles, and I'm going to try to hit it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so that would technically be a 7th-level Magic Missile, which means you'd shoot nine darts, so 9d4 plus nine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (counting) 20.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Uno mas.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: One more? 21 plus--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Plus nine?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 30 points of force damage. As you hold the wand out in front of you, full-on anime missile style, nine magic arcane missiles slam into Rakanishu. As the impacts hit, Aluneth, in the back of your mind, goes, "Yes, that's what I'm talking about!" Awesome. And you're going to stay in the water?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Heck yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Bundle, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to cast Spirit Guardians at level three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Spirit Guardians is still up, isn't it, though?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Mousetrap! Goddamn it. I miss. Can I have my die back?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope. It's mine now. All right, that ends your turn. It is now Rakanishu's turn. The flames continue to swell even larger, and now there is a flaming radius. Fire is now around him. You see all the wax around him is beginning to burn and bubble in the immediate vicinity. He's going to make two fire rake attacks: one against you, and one against you. Against you, that is an 18.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, I'm an 18 AC.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits you, just barely. And against you, that is a 16.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That misses.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, it misses you. You, however, suffer 19 points of fire damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (groaning)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (impact) Falls to the ground, burning in cinders. Still conscious, but hurting.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Still conscious?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not conscious, sorry. Still

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Still alive.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, and with that, you watch as Rakanishu begins to move into the chamber, and the presence begins to light the commodes on fire. The wood's beginning to burn. The entire area is now in flames.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Pots.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do get an attack of opportunity as he moves away from you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits. You suffer five points of fire damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's nine points of bludgeoning damage, and I'll put some Branding Smite into it, as well, as a bonus action. Do I get a bonus action as a reaction?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On a reaction, you don't, so you can't do that. Nine points of bludgeoning. All right--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is he within 15 feet of me now? He has to do a wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Still takes damage, but it's halved, I believe.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's 3d8. 12, so six points of radiant damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, end of the turn, top of your turn, Lohkor, you suffer three points of fire damage from the proximity of the fire aura. All right, your turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: My turn. Two attacks against him. That's a 23, should hit, and the second one is-- no, that's not a hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so four points of fire damage from the first hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nine points of bludgeoning damage, and as a bonus action, I'm going to put Branding Smite into it, which is 2d6 radiant damage, and the enemy glows bright.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I think he's pretty bright as it is.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Four points of radiant damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty, got it. That ends your turn? All right, so you rush up to him. All of you are clustered in the commode, which is now in flames all around. Aerwin, your turn.

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: I'm going to shoot him with the crossbow--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're now on the other side of the chamber, crossbow out. Go for it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits. Roll damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is Lohkor adjacent? Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, you hit, so a cube, plus sneak attack damage. Four, plus these guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21 points of damage. Okay, so it sticks in the back, and you watch the flames, while growing, it's starting to grow thin. The flames are growing more disparate, and the connectivity of all this fire is beginning to look like the mass is lessening. The damage is starting to take a toll on it. Are you going to stay where you are?

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: I'll back up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you're even further away on the opposite side? Gotcha. All right, cool. That brings us to-- make a death saving throw.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yo. I'm good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Greldemeyer, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Greldamine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Greldamine, sorry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's fine. It's a hard name.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Grundlemeyer.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Gwendelmere.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to cast-- Grandlefarts!-- Sleep again, at 2nd-level.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, go for it. Roll the dice.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: On the thing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. That's how many? 7d8?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (counting) 25.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as the flame begins to flicker a bit, then die down to this tiniest little candle flicker on the ground. And there, you see this tiny flame that's wavering lazily. Room is still on fire, and everything around it is awful, but apparently, it was at a point where the Sleep could take effect.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my gosh! You guys, grab as many candles as you can, and let's get the hell out of here!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Snuff that flame?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know! If you damage it, it wakes back up. I'm not exactly sure how this thing works.

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: I have a waterskin. If it's that size and sleeping, would that much water take it out?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's grab all the candles we can. They might all be completely melted.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: About 20 seconds have passed. Should I make another death save?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you should.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can somebody else please make an investigation check? We're searching for candles.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Take 2d4 plus two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You manage to find an armful of soft candles. They're pushed together and mush now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is there a bag I can shove some wax into?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've got sacks. You quickly start filling sacks. How long does the spell last for Sleep?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It doesn't say. Oh, a minute.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You've got to hurry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Really quickly!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What happened?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Good things. We're running!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did I get him?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes. We're running.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What are we doing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right as we're running out, pour the water on him, and we'll jump in the latrine.

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: Got it. It's done!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you guys all rush into the latrine room, and what are you doing?

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: I have the waterskin. I'm going to pour some water on this tiny flame and try to kill it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you uncork it and pour the water onto the flame. You watch the flame (whoosh). It restores into the full Rakanishu elemental. The room immediately, all the flames brighten once more. What are you guys doing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Jumping into the latrine!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, jump into the latrine, and maybe let the raging current take us wherever.

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: It goes somewhere.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The rushing river, you mean? Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Right, so we make a run, and I make a wisdom save, and I fail, so I turn around and go back. I drop my candles.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All of you guys dive into the water, letting the water take you like a water slide, one after the other, and you watch as Quazirat turns around with Adventurefury, the Blessed Blade of the Thrill-Seeker in his hand, and knows, "No, this is your fate. This is your glory." And the last thing you see before you all vanish into the water is him scream and run towards the reformed Rakanishu's elemental form.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: LRJenkins1234!

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: Your father's proud of you!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're being rushed around the current. It's battering you around at a rapid speed. Even those of you with darkvision, things are coming by so fast that you're only seeing things quick enough before it impacts you. I need all of you to make a perception check. If you have darkvision, you make it with advantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Success.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17? Okay, you all succeed, so you only suffer three points of bludgeoning damage as you guys are being battered around-- oh, you go limp and unconscious.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, you do?!

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: I only had two left.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, as you're being thrust around inside, the river's carrying you, and you're trying to hold your breath. The air escapes your lungs. You guys all try your best to hold together. You hit another sequence of rock. Using your perception from before, you still only suffer another seven points of bludgeoning amongst you, so seven, seven-- actually, it would be half, so three to each of you. Eventually, after a minute or so, your lungs begin to burn from holding in the air. What's your constitution?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What about you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're struggling and drowning, and you limply begin to float to the surface.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is she floating to the surface? I'm going to follow her up, then.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Make a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is my plate mail a problem?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ten?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten? You go unconscious and begin drowning.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does that mean I start floating?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're scrambling under the water and go limp and begin to slowly rise up, as well. Two of them begin to rise up in the water.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Rise up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, as you guys break the surface, (gasping) you glance around, gasping in the cold air. The blue sky above you is nearly cloudless: a welcome sight as you recognize the nearby docks and humble buildings of Lakeshore, where you once left. You apparently were jettisoned to the bottom of Lake Everstill, and you're just around the corner from where you started this venture.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Healing Word, level two; Healing Word, level three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you come to consciousness. She's a little worse for wear.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no. Do you have Revivify?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If I use my Healing Word not knowing that she was dead-- did I use my Healing Word not knowing she was dead? Because I'm out of magic, at that point, if I've used two Healing Words.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a medicine check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, that'll do.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Also, did his spell reach three miles back?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 24? Glancing over as you begin to cast the spell, you recognize the signs that she is not--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Revivify on this one, Healing Word at level two on this one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, I'll allow that. For the purposes of this, you reach over, and from the cold shackles of death, the spirit of Aerwin, who went on to greet the goddess Elune, is pulled back into her form as she gasps for breath back at the surface and begins to paddle.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Big dwarven punch in the face. Wake up!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Waterlogged and down one ally, you make your way, beaten and bruised. So you have two satchels of no-longer-soft candles, and you make your way inside Lakeshore Inn, which has another patron now, so business is booming. You see as Wental turns around as you enter and goes, "My goodness, "friends! You've returned! Oh, and a little worse for wear, but where's your friend with the "beard?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He died.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He died getting your candles.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You owe us lunch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm terribly sorry, but food can be prepared. That's a shame. But did you get my "candles?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Show him the bag.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you dump out a solid rock of wax onto the wooden table, he glances down.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Those creatures, they had melted all of your candles already. We saved as much wax as we could for you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, poor Toes!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Will one of you please look after my WoW account?

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: Absolutely.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you guys so much for playing. Thank you, Jen, for coming and joining us.

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: Amazing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you very much to Blizzard for working with us and putting this together and letting us play in Azeroth for a bit. Once again, please check out the Kobolds & Catacombs expansion for Hearthstone releasing on December 7th, and they're streaming on the official Blizzard Twitch and YouTube on the 5th for their awesome Kobolds & Catacombs escape room. Thank you guys, again. Have a wonderful night, and is it Thursday yet? (cheering)
